mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET state=4 WHERE rno=#{rno};
mapper.select: SELECT rno rsvNum,a.mno,bname,phone,rdate rsvDate FROM (SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE mno=#{mno} AND stno=#{state}) a, business WHERE a.bno=business.bno;
SELECT r.lno,lname laundry,cnt count,stno state, price*cnt price FROM rsv_laundry r, laundry_type t, (SELECT * FROM bsn_laundry WHERE bno=1) bl WHERE r.lno=t.lno AND bl.lno=r.lno AND rno=#{rsvNum};
